5. Prevents historical records from being snooped.
Secure mode activated. CoolManager will comprehensively prevent third-party apps from reading your data.

The phone can automatically display the actual data usage by sending a query message to the carrier.
Query messages are periodically sent to the carrier to calibrate data usage.

Apps that release ads or notifications
After being disabled, apps will not release notifications.
After being disabled, detected ad plugins will no longer take effect.
广告插件，是移动广告平台为手机软件提供的广告模板，可以让应用随时随地插入商业广告，赚取一定利润

"Coolpad shall not be held liable for any consequences of using Coolmanager. Users shall not in any manner reproduce, distribute, modify, decompile, disassemble, decrypt, extract, reverse engineer, lease, assign, or sublicense the CoolManager application, unless such restrictions are prohibited by applicable laws or such actions are approved by respective copyright holders. The CoolManager application is subject to constant updates for the purposes of providing new features and fixing bugs. Meanwhile, Coolpad guarantees that update modules for the said application contain no code that aims to maliciously affect user computer systems. Selecting Agree indicates that you trust and willingly use this application, and accept all usage statement clauses. Selecting Disagree indicates that you do not accept the usage statement clauses."
同意免责声明方可使用密码保管箱
Avoid binding the password to this phone.
关闭密码保管箱会增加您账号密码泄露风险,请谨慎使用!
密码保管箱绑定手机号码修改成功!
密码保管箱绑定手机号码修改失败!
Agree with CoolManager password keeper usage statement.
忘记密码时，可以通过该手机号码找回
假密码不能与真密码一致!
修改的密码不能与自定义的假密码一致!
修改的密码安全性低，请重新输入!
Accounts and passwords will never be forgotten.
1、创建酷管家密码，提供绝对安全的输入环境。
2、在密码环境中，提供让所有I/O接口处于密码保护状态，让数据在多个终端中导入导出，都能获得最安全的保护。
3、存储数据时，提供安全存储环境，让数据无法被恶意破解。
